body.name: Single Serve Coffee Machine, 3 in 1 Pod Coffee Maker for K Cup Pods & Ground Coffee & Teas, 6 to 14oz Brew Sizes, with 40oz Removable Water Reservoir, Self-cleaning Function, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 36 mins
features: 【3 IN 1 BREWING FUNCTION】This pod coffee maker is equipped with 2 adaptors and reusable capsule, which is compatible with any K cup of normal brand, and also supports brewing your favorite ground coffee or tea.
【FITS ANYWHERE】Less than 5.1” wide, fits neatly on your countertop.
【5 CUP SIZES】Brew an 6, 8, 10, 12,or 14 oz. cup for every occasion.
【TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY】Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.2” tall.

【SELF-CLEANING FUNCTION】Press and hold 'SIZE' and 'BREW' at the same time to enable the automatic cleaning function. By using this function once every two months, the coffee maker can effectively avoid clogging problems and extend its life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KIDISLE 3 IN 1 SLIM COFFEE MAKER The ultimate brewing companion for all your coffee and tea needs! This versatile machine is designed to brew both K-cup pods and ground coffee, as well as teas, giving you a wide range of options to satisfy your beverage cravings.
Previous page Next page 1 For K-cup 2 For Tea 3 For Coffee Ground
Rapid Brew, Ideal Temperature, Smart Standby: Coffee Perfection!

Efficient Maintenance Features for Your Coffee Maker Cleaning Cycle Reminder After 300 cycles, the CLEAN light flash to remind you to clean and descale your coffee maker. Self-cleaning Function Press and hold 'SIZE' and 'BREW' at the same time to enable the automatic cleaning function. Dredge Needle Use to clean the water outlet pin and the capsule adapter pin to avoid blockage. Removal Reservoir & Drip Tray Remove the water tank and drip tray for easy cleaning and maintenance.

What's included in the package when I buy this coffee maker? Coffee maker, accessories, manual, troubleshooting card. How do I use the self-cleaning function? Simply press and hold both 'SIZE' and 'BREW' buttons simultaneously for a few seconds. Why are the buttons not responding when I press them? Whether the lights are flashing, if yes, the lid isn’t securely closed. If no, ensure your hands are dry when using the buttons for optimal responsiveness. Why does the machine make a noise during operation? The coffee maker may produce some noise, particularly when heating water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee ready when you are
reviews.reviewText: Coffee comes out Hot! 5 sizes from 6oz to 14oz. Plenty of accessories for your own grounds and pods. Tea leaves too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great machine for my classroom
reviews.reviewText: This is a GREAT machine. It works very well. I got it to use at school (I'm a teacher) to help me stop spending money everyday at the big coffee shops. I am choosing to use it for brew coffee and it works great. As you can see, it comes with 5 reusable filters! You can also use it with K-cups if you want. There are 5 different sizes you can brew--6-14 oz, and a cleaning option.It does have a pretty small water basin--large enough to make about 2 12-14oz cups before needing to refill it, but this comes as part of the slim design it has. It is not tall enough to put a tall cup underneath. The cup shown holds 14oz with a little bit of room. You can take off the bottom drip catcher to add a little bit of room, but not much more. It is very easy to use as well.The cord is only about 2 ft long, which is great for placement on a counter. I am using it behind my desk, so I would like a longer cord, but my use and placement is not typical, I don't imagine, so I think it's great to have a short cord for counter use. It takes about 4 mins to brew a first cup, but that includes heating up the water.All in all, I think this is a great machine with great versatility, and I'd recommend it to anyone who doesn't want to spend the big bucks on the name-brand machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a coffee drinker
reviews.reviewText: Not being a coffee or tea drinker, I needed something for my coffee and tea drinking guests. This was the perfect solution. It offers a 3 in 1 option. It can be used for K cup pods, ground coffee and loose teas. It really comes in handy with the 6 to 14 oz brew size options. They can make their own coffee and it does not take long to make. The self-cleaning function is useful since I prefer not to spend too much time on a coffee maker. An extra bonus is the small sleek footprint. Wish it came in red.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality seems reasonable so far
reviews.reviewText: Feels decently high-quality for an off-brand single-serve coffee machine, not like a cheaply produced knockoff but like someone put thought into it. Reasonably intuitive buttons, a good-sized removable water reservoir, easily visible max fill line (which you’d think would be a given, but isn’t), lots of brew size options, and different brew adapters so you can use refillable pods, pre-packaged pods, or put coffee straight in the basket like in a traditional coffee machine. It’s useful that in theory it tells you when it needs cleaning and has a dedicated cleaning cycle, though I haven’t had it long enough to see if the cleaning alert works. It came with lots of reusable coffee pods and was packed safely but minimally, a balance that makes me happy. The manual is also written in readable English, hallelujah!So far we’ve used it with pre-packaged pods for hot chocolate and coffee. It works as expected and doesn’t take up much space on the counter or in a cabinet. My only issues are minor ones. I wish you could directly choose your cup size (instead of cycling through the sizes by pressing the brew size button multiple times), especially since it doesn’t remember your last size setting. It’s slightly noisy (at least, it’s louder than my last, simpler machine), with a high-pitched whirring period right after it finishes brewing. Almost none of our travel mugs will fit into the cup area, but we can pour from a cup to a travel mug if necessary.I’ll update if something goes wrong, but for light use, the machine seems to perform well and I’m currently happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking, compact, quick, easy to use and a great price.
reviews.reviewText: The Kidisle 3 in 1 coffee maker is a good choice if you want a Keurig-like coffee maker without the Keurig price tag. We recently purchased a Keurig for my husband’s home office, but didn’t want to spend that much again for the kitchen. I normally just use manual brewing methods. I do like having something quicker like this for company, though.Having brewing options and so many cup size options with this coffee maker is great. It’s nice looking and very compact. It doesn’t take up a huge amount of space on my countertop, so I was able to fit it in a small area without having to rearrange anything. Once I received the coffee maker I immediately wanted to try it. I cleaned up the accessories and water basin and ran the water through as the instructions suggested. I tried both methods and they both worked perfectly. The adapters are easy to use and so are the k-cups. My only complaint is that the buttons aren’t as responsive as I’d like. I’m hoping that I’ll learn how best to press them and for how long or with how much force. They eventually work, but I found myself pressing multiple times not knowing if I did it right, hard enough or for long enough. I think I will get used to the buttons eventually. That being said, I think this is a very nice coffee maker and I’m happy I ordered it. At this price (currently $69.99) I doubt you will find a better brewer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This off-brand single-serve coffee machine impresses with its high-quality build and intuitive design. It offers various brew options and includes adapters for different pods. While I haven't tested the cleaning alert, it seems convenient. The machine comes with plenty of reusable coffee pods and is packed securely. It works well for hot chocolate and coffee, but selecting cup size isn't direct, and it's slightly noisy. Overall, it performs satisfactorily for light use, and I'll update if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent single serve coffee machine
reviews.reviewText: Overall a good coffee machine with a few drawbacks.Pros:- Easy to use- Multiple cup size options- Options for pods and loose fill coffee.- Removable water tank for easy filling.Cons:- Touch controls are not great. You have to use just the right pressure.- The brewing process can be a little loud
